content:
From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
Dear Isabelle users on macOS,

yesterday my MacMini M1 proposed an update to macOS 13.0 Ventura. The
installation actually worked smoothly (after doing the Isabelle release).

So far, Isabelle2022 appears to work fine on macOS 13.0. This has not always
been the case for major macOS updates, so it is worth noting.

Makarius
